statements: SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, assessed_by, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE project_name LIKE '%Construction%';
SELECT assessed_by, assessment_details FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date < '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT project_name, location FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT assessment_id, assessed_by FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE project_name LIKE '%sustainability%';
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, location ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_assessments FROM environmental_impact_assessments WHERE mitigation_measures IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM environmental_assessments;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date FROM environmental_assessments WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT assessment_id, project_name, estimated_impact FROM environmental_assessments ORDER BY estimated_impact DESC;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_measures WHERE cost_estimate > 5000;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM environmental_assessments WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT * FROM environmental_assessments;
SELECT project_name, location, estimated_impact FROM environmental_assessments WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM environmental_assessments WHERE estimated_impact > 5000;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, cost_estimate FROM environmental_assessments JOIN mitigation_measures ON environmental_assessments.assessment_id = mitigation_measures.assessment_id;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_measures WHERE cost_estimate < 10000 AND effectiveness = 'High';
SELECT project_name, assessment_date, assessed_by FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, project_name, assessment_results FROM environmental_impact_assessments;
SELECT * FROM mitigation_measures ORDER BY measure_effectiveness DESC;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM geothermal_projects WHERE project_status = 'In Progress';
SELECT assessment_id, COUNT(measure_id) AS num_measures FROM mitigation_measures GROUP BY assessment_id HAVING num_measures >= 2;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments
SELECT project_name, assessment_date FROM environmental_impact_assessments
SELECT * FROM mitigation_measures
SELECT measure_description, measure_effectiveness FROM mitigation_measures
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM geothermal_projects
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment;
SELECT project_name, location, assessment_date FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment;
SELECT assessors, impact_description FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment;
SELECT * FROM MitigationMeasures;
SELECT measure_name, measure_description, effectiveness FROM MitigationMeasures;
SELECT * FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment;
SELECT project_name, location, assessment_date FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE location='California';
SELECT id, measure_name, measure_description, effectiveness FROM MitigationMeasures WHERE effectiveness='High';
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM GeothermalProject ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_name, assessors, impact_description FROM EnvironmentalImpactAssessment WHERE assessors LIKE '%Anna%';
SELECT * FROM geothermal_projects;
SELECT project_name, location FROM geothermal_projects ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT project_id, start_date, end_date FROM geothermal_projects WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM environmental_impact_assessments INNER JOIN geothermal_projects ON environmental_impact_assessments.project_id = geothermal_projects.project_id;
SELECT stakeholder_name, contact_info FROM stakeholders WHERE stakeholder_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM geothermal_projects;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM geothermal_projects WHERE location = 'California';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date, location FROM geothermal_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT p.project_name, a.impact_summary, m.measure_description FROM geothermal_projects p JOIN environmental_impact_assessments a ON p.project_id = a.project_id JOIN mitigation_measures m ON a.assessment_id = m.assessment_id;
SELECT s.stakeholder_name, s.contact_info, ps.project_id FROM stakeholders s JOIN project_stakeholders ps ON s.stakeholder_id = ps.stakeholder_id WHERE ps.project_id = 1;
